thread.title: Dynamic Trend Integrates with Tradier Brokerage, Inc. in Exclusive Collaboration to Bring Innovation, Savings and Efficiency to Option Traders
thread.title_full: Dynamic Trend Integrates with Tradier Brokerage, Inc. in Exclusive Collaboration to Bring Innovation, Savings and Efficiency to Option Traders - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Dynamic Trend Integrates with Tradier Brokerage, Inc. in Exclusive Collaboration to Bring Innovation, Savings and Efficiency to Option Traders
text:
Leading U.S. options analysis platform integrates with Tradier Brokerage API to empower its members with significant cost savings and the ability to swiftly move from idea to action.
Charlotte, NC (PRWEB) September 16, 2015
Tradier Brokerage, Inc., the leading cloud-based financial services brokerage firm, today announced that Dynamic Trend has integrated its Option Dynamics platform with their Brokerage API. The exclusive alliance empowers Option Dynamics clients around the world to benefit from integrated, easy-to-use options tools and capabilities with low commissions. Furthermore, options traders can go from idea to trade in real-time – a combined capability of premium level service and efficiency for Dynamic Trend members.
Option Dynamics, built by the developers of Advanced GET, is a leading options analysis platform with an extensive set of enhanced option tools. From selecting the right stock, direction, expiration month, strikes and option strategy, Option Dynamics provides the information necessary to make smarter and better trades.
Serving as a one-stop-shop for the traders’ technical analysis needs – from identification to analysis to trade - the seamless integration with Tradier’s API and web-based trade ticket allows options traders to benefit from more cost-effective data subscriptions and pricing as well as innovative brokerage technology. Savvy traders are now able to make smarter and easier option trades, benefiting from Tradier’s brokerage platform and Option Dynamics’ comprehensive set of tools including:
Real-Time Options / Strategy Scanner – Traders can quickly find stocks set for covered calls, vertical spread and credit spread candidates, or scan individual equity options based on specific criteria (e.g. price, open interest, Greek values or implied volatility). Advanced Options Modeling – Traders can model their option strategy via a risk graph, skew charts, theta decay modeling, position delta modeling and more. Automatic Spread Builder – Traders are able to quickly search for the best options spreads from 37 different spread types. Options Spread Projection – Traders can forecast option or spread values into the future, saving valuable hours of manual work on complex spread analysis.
“Dynamic Trend’s integration with Tradier’s open brokerage technology platform extends our ability to offer a more comprehensive end-to-end solution for our users, starting with the decision making process and analysis right down to the execution of a trade,” said Tom Joseph, founder and CEO of Option Dynamics. “In addition to providing real-time information and insights on stocks and listed options, our integration with Tradier allows our traders to create and execute multi leg option strategies with a few mouse clicks.”
“Option Dynamics brings to the financial services industry a comprehensive set of tools which only a few years ago were out of reach or unheard of to options traders. This exclusive integration with Tradier’s API enhances the traders’ experience and provides them with stock and options data and analysis, optimized pricing, and trade execution capabilities -- all at their fingertips,” said Dan Raju, Founder and CEO at Tradier, Inc. “Tradier’s collaboration with Option Dynamics is another strong example of the unbundling of the financial services industry. As traders increasingly demand choice, flexibility, more sophisticated and cost-effective trading tools, innovative fintech leaders like Dynamic Trend are meeting this growing demand – and shaking up traditional legacy systems and providers.”
To better understand the benefits of Dynamic Trend integration with the Tradier brokerage API, check out this video: http://www.dynamictrend.com/tradiervideos/
For information on Tradier Brokerage, Inc., visit https://brokerage.tradier.com , contact us at (980) 272-3880 or engage with us on Twitter @tradier.
About Dynamic Trend
Option Dynamics is a powerful U.S equity options analysis platform with an extensive set of enhanced option tools. Developed by Tom Joseph and staff, the developers of Advanced GET. From selecting the right stock, the right direction, the right expiration month and strikes, Option Dynamics provides the data you need to make smarter trading decisions. For more information, visit: http://www.dynamictrend.com/ or contact us at (330) 645-0800.
About Tradier Brokerage Inc.
Tradier Brokerage, Inc. a member of FINRA and SIPC is an independent subsidiary of Tradier, Inc. The Brokerage API enables advisors, entrepreneurs, businesses, developers and active traders to solve their trading and brokerage challenges using the independent content and tool providers of their choice – at simple and competitive prices.
About Tradier, Inc.
Tradier, Inc. (tradier.com) is a cloud-based financial services provider and brokerage API company that offers a groundbreaking platform to serve Platform Providers, Advisors, Developers and Individual Investors. Tradier delivers an innovative set of fully hosted API's, modules and "out of the box" tools that are leveraged by a growing list of providers seeking to create innovative trading and investing experiences.
Created by developers, Tradier is a technology linchpin that works with organizations that want to democratize access to data, trade execution, low cost trading and market connectivity through cloud access. In addition, Tradier’s APIs empowers third-party developers and advisors to build applications such as algorithmic and robotic investing and trading offerings.
The Tradier solution features REST-based and Streaming APIs, and turnkey tools that deliver speed, choice and simplicity – all on a secure platform.
For information on Tradier Inc, visit http://www.Tradier.com or contact us at 980.272.3670.
